description: Salford Red Devils sign Wigan Warriors forward Tiaki Chan on a rolling loan deal.
title: Tiaki Chan: Salford Red Devils sign Wigan Warriors forward on loan
title_page: Tiaki Chan: Salford Red Devils sign Wigan Warriors forward on loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Salford Red Devils have signed Wigan Warriors forward Tiaki Chan on a rolling loan deal.
The 24-year-old France international started his career with Catalans Dragons and joined the Warriors for the 2024 season.
He made three appearances for Matt Peet's side last season and spent time on loan with Hull FC.
The terms of the deal mean it can be extended month to month.
The Red Devils were issued with a reduced sustainability cap and ordered to sell players by the Rugby Football League earlier this month.
Uncertainty about the their future at Salford Community Stadium has led to doubts over gathering commercial revenue and left gaps in their finances.
